data.enText: pieces of wood, metal, brick, etc. that are left after sth has been destroyed
Emergency teams are still clearing the debris from the plane crash.
data.chText: 各抢救小组仍在清理失事飞机的残骸。

data.enText: pieces of material that are not wanted and rubbish/garbage that are left somewhere
Clear away leaves and other garden debris from the pond.
data.chText: 把池塘里的树叶和其他庭园垃圾清除干净。

ex.enText: Tom went to dump the garbage.
Garbage pollutes our rivers and lakes.
ex.chText: 垃圾污染我们的河川湖泊。

synonyms.bx: 多指生活中的有机废料，如废纸、包装盒、剩饭剩菜或变质的食物等。

ex.enText: The ditches had filled up with mud and debris.
ex.chText: 沟渠中塞满了淤泥和垃圾。

ex.enText: Was the debris removed in your presence?
ex.chText: 你在现场时，碎渣等垃圾是否清除掉了？

synonyms.bx: 指某处堆积的垃圾或某种材料无用的碎渣、碎片等。

ex.enText: There is a heap of junk in the corner.
He threw away all the junk in the boot of his car.
ex.chText: 他把汽车行李箱中所有废旧杂物都扔掉了。

synonyms.bx: 指没有用处、毫无价值的废旧物品。

ex.enText: There were piles of litter in the streets.

synonyms.bx: 尤指在公共场所散落于地、有碍观瞻的废弃物。

ex.enText: They burnt up all the garden rubbish.
ex.chText: 他们将花园中的垃圾全部烧掉了。

ex.enText: The dustman comes once a week to collect the rubbish.
ex.chText: 垃圾工每周来收一次垃圾。

ex.enText: Oh God, he's got so much rubbish on his desk!
ex.chText: 天哪，他桌上有那么多垃圾！

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指扔掉的食物、废纸等；也可指任何不再使用而应该扔掉的东西，但作此义解时多用于非正式文体。

ex.enText: Put all the waste in this bag.
ex.chText: 把所有垃圾放进这只袋子里。

ex.enText: They disposed of the city's waste in the sea.
ex.chText: 他们把城里的垃圾倒入海中。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，多指已无使用价值的材料或陈旧的、破损的物品，也可指任何被丢弃之物。

tr: the remains of something that has been destroyed or broken up

example.ex: I stood at the foot of the collapsed tower and watched the rescue workers sifting through the debris...
example.tran: 我站在倒塌的高塔脚下，看着救援人员在瓦砾堆中搜寻。

example.ex: A number of people were killed by flying debris.
example.tran: 有数人被飞射的碎片击中身亡。

value.def: Debris is pieces from something that has been destroyed or pieces of rubbish or unwanted material that are spread around.

trans: 磨损颗粒；磨屑；磨损产物；磨损
